definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Complete disintegration of cytoplasm at stage of vacuolated microspore.
sentences.chinese: 单核液泡期的小孢子细胞质完全解体。

sentences.english: The sea water is said to be hypertonic to the cytoplasm .
sentences.chinese: 海水对细胞质来说是高渗的。

sentences.english: An infection thread is formed by the cytoplasm of the host cell.
sentences.chinese: 侵染线是由寄主细胞的细胞质形成的。

sentences.english: Microtubule bundles in the tetrad cell radiated from the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 在细胞质存在一个疏松的微管束网络。

sentences.english: Others are associated with the protoplasm of the cell.
sentences.chinese: 其它一些与细胞的细胞质有关。

sentences.english: The smooth surfaced endoplasmic reticulum, mitochondria and fat droplet almost disappeared in cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 细胞质中的滑面内质网，线粒体与脂滴几乎全部消失。
糖酵解发生在细胞质中。

sentences.english: They move through the cytoplasm to the lowermost cell surface. See gravitropism.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以从细胞质运动到细胞最低处的细胞表面位置。

sentences.english: The cell cytoplasm is filled with a gelatinous substance.
sentences.chinese: 细胞质是一种使细胞充满的凝胶状物质。

sentences.english: The cell nucleus and cytoplasm become fragmented as enzymes such as caspases destroy cellular components.
sentences.chinese: 细胞核和细胞质由于酶的作用变成了碎片。

sentences.english: The results showed that PrNV replicated only in the cytoplasm of larval midgut cells.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明该病毒只在菜青虫中肠细胞质内增殖。

sentences.english: Microfilaments and microtubules are responsible for almost all major cytoplasmic movements.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分细胞质运动由微丝和微管完成。

sentences.english: Necrosis of hepatocytes and cytoplasmic blebbing were also observed.
sentences.chinese: 坏死的肝细胞和细胞质的起泡是被观察到了。

sentences.english: The nucleus in shrinking cytoplasm of microspore mother cell enters into telophase . 17.
sentences.chinese: 收缩的小孢子母细胞质中核进入减数分裂末期。

sentences.english: The cytoplasm were degraded into central vacuole gradually and haustorial mother cells lost their physiological function.
sentences.chinese: 吸器母细胞细胞质逐渐空泡化后丧失其生理功能。

sentences.english: The cytoplasms of amebic cyst in different states were dense, packed with lipid drops, spherical mitochondria and lysosomes.
sentences.chinese: 而虫体的细胞质内富含粒线体和溶脂酶。
